Author: hammerprice
Text: If the instructor is thinking anything he's probably thinking you were too nervous/shy to accept money/being paid for by someone you don't know that well. A lot of people will refuse and refuse in a situation like that even if they really do want food because it's so ingrained in them that it's rude to let a stranger shout you.

Author: stregapegg
Text: I bet you’re okay! Sometimes we assume what people are thinking and that does us more harm than good.  On the plus side, you didn’t eat anything from gross mcD’s so yay for you!
